strings:
<voice_0x01000C40><se_def>Angelo: ...I realise I said it before the funeral,
but I just wanted to assure you that
everyone knows you're innocent.
<voice_0x01000C41><se_def>Angelo: If it weren't for you, Captain Marcello could well have been killed too. We're all in your debt.
<voice_0x01000C42><se_def>Angelo: ...Anyway, the Templar Captain has summoned you to his office.

<voice_0x01000C43><se_def>Angelo: See you later then.
Don't forget!
